data.author: Anodyzed

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed a couple of bugs with the days not showing properly and other annoying bugs.

There is a color version with more features in the works, but it's taking longer than I had hoped.

Fixed Bluetooth Connection Indicator.
Don't vibrate on activation when "Vibrate on Bluetooth Connection" is enabled.
Fixed problem of losing settings when switching watchfaces
Fixed the problem of the Month being off by one.

data.description:
The Big Time watch face with a font similar to the beautiful CST KickStarter Watch (http://centralstandardtiming.com).

* Shows the Day of the Week and Day/Month at the bottom of the window (internationalizable)
* Includes Bluetooth Connection & Pebble Power Level indicators 
* Ability to Vibrate on the Hour or on Bluetooth Connection Acquisition/Loss

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed a couple of bugs with the days not showing properly and other annoying bugs.

There is a color version with more features in the works, but it's taking longer than I had hoped.

data.title: CST Big Time
